data:item.name: USB to CAN-FD Adaptor
data:item.display_title: USB to CAN-FD Adaptor based on MCXN Microcontroller
data:item.overview: This application note aims to build a USB to CAN-FD adaptor where the USB data retransmit to CAN-bus and vice versa. NXP MCXN devices a high-speed USB port and CAN-FD controllers. HS USB can reach up to 480 Mbit/s transmission speed, which is enough for transmitting CAN-FD frame at highest CAN baud rate on MCXN 8Mbit/s. To make the system easy to use and compatible with other devices, we use USB CDC virtual COM port as communication. Python Interface is used to visualize the CAN-FD information in ASCII format.
